statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, last_service_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_model, vehicle_make, last_service_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY last_service_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_make FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE last_service_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_details LIKE '%oil change%';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY vehicle_make ASC, vehicle_model DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT vehicle_make, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_count FROM vehicle_maintenance_records GROUP BY vehicle_make HAVING COUNT(vehicle_id) > 1

SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_make, vehicle_model, DATE_FORMAT(last_service_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_service_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE last_service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_make IN ('Toyota', 'Honda', 'Ford')
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, LOWER(service_details) AS formatted_service_details FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY vehicle_model ASC
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenance;
SELECT vehicle_type, service_description FROM VehicleMaintenance WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT service_cost, mechanic_name FROM ServiceHistory WHERE service_cost > 500;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, service_cost FROM ServiceHistory WHERE mechanic_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenance ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, service_date, service_description FROM VehicleMaintenance WHERE service_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY service_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, service_date, service_description FROM VehicleMaintenance WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' AND service_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, service_date, service_description FROM VehicleMaintenance ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC, service_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT vh.vehicle_id, vh.vehicle_type, sh.service_date, sh.service_cost, sh.mechanic_name FROM VehicleMaintenance vh JOIN ServiceHistory sh ON vh.vehicle_id = sh.vehicle_id WHERE sh.service_cost > 500 ORDER BY sh.service_cost DESC;

SELECT vh.vehicle_id, vh.vehicle_type, sh.service_date, sh.mechanic_name FROM VehicleMaintenance vh LEFT JOIN ServiceHistory sh ON vh.vehicle_id = sh.vehicle_id WHERE sh.mechanic_name = 'Joe Smith' ORDER BY vh.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE make='Toyota';
SELECT model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT make, model, vin FROM vehicle WHERE model LIKE 'C%' AND vin LIKE '1%' ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT make, year, COUNT(*) FROM vehicle GROUP BY make, year HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, mechanic FROM maintenance_history WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE mechanic = 'John Doe' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT vehicle.make, vehicle.model, parts_used.part_name, parts_used.part_cost FROM vehicle INNER JOIN maintenance_history ON vehicle.vehicle_id = maintenance_history.vehicle_id INNER JOIN parts_used ON maintenance_history.maintenance_id = parts_used.maintenance_id WHERE vehicle.make = 'Ford';

SELECT vehicle.make, vehicle.model, COUNT(parts_used.parts_id) as total_parts_used FROM vehicle INNER JOIN maintenance_history ON vehicle.vehicle_id = maintenance_history.vehicle_id INNER JOIN parts_used ON maintenance_history.maintenance_id = parts_used.maintenance_id GROUP BY vehicle.make, vehicle.model ORDER BY total_parts_used DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vin, make, model FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialty FROM Mechanic WHERE specialty = 'Engine';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceEvent WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT Vehicle.make, Vehicle.model, MaintenanceEvent.service_description FROM Vehicle JOIN MaintenanceEvent ON Vehicle.vehicle_id = MaintenanceEvent.vehicle_id;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialty FROM Mechanic WHERE specialty = 'Engine Repair';
SELECT service_description, cost FROM MaintenanceEvent WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota' OR make = 'Honda';
SELECT event_id, assigned_date, mechanic_id FROM EventAssignment ORDER BY assigned_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make='Toyota';
SELECT vin, model, make, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 AND make='Ford';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE service_type='Oil Change' ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity, price FROM parts_inventory WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC, make ASC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT v.make, v.model, m.name FROM vehicles AS v JOIN mechanics AS m ON v.make = m.specialization;
SELECT v.make, v.model, COUNT(*) AS total_mechanics FROM vehicles AS v JOIN mechanics AS m ON v.make = m.specialization GROUP BY v.make, v.model;
SELECT p.part_name, SUM(p.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM parts_inventory AS p GROUP BY p.part_name HAVING SUM(p.quantity) > 10 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
